text: O'Brien J (2022). spRingsteen: Things Data Springsteen. https://github.com/obrienjoey/spRingsteen, https://obrienjoey.github.io/spRingsteen/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {spRingsteen: All Things Data and Springsteen},   author = {Joey O'Brien},   year = {2022},   note = {https://github.com/obrienjoey/spRingsteen, https://obrienjoey.github.io/spRingsteen/}, }

title: All Things Data and Springsteen
text: spRingsteen package provides number dataframes describing songs, albums, tours, setlists Bruce Springsteen’s career. data (collected Brucebase) provided tidy form easily analysed R. scripts used scrape data entirety, alongside SQLite representation data may viewed second repository springsteen_db.

title: All Things Data and Springsteen
text: can install development version spRingsteen GitHub like :

title: All Things Data and Springsteen
text: package includes datasets around career Bruce Springsteen. example, touring history numerous bands stored concerts:
code: library(spRingsteen) library(dplyr)  concerts #> # A tibble: 2,930 x 6 #>    gig_key                                       date       location        state city  country #>    <chr>                                         <date>     <chr>           <chr> <chr> <chr>   #>  1 /gig:1973-01-03-main-point-bryn-mawr-pa-early 1973-01-03 THE MAIN POINT~ PA    <NA>  USA     #>  2 /gig:1973-01-03-main-point-bryn-mawr-pa-late  1973-01-03 THE MAIN POINT~ PA    <NA>  USA     #>  3 /gig:1973-01-04-main-point-bryn-mawr-pa-early 1973-01-04 THE MAIN POINT~ PA    <NA>  USA     #>  4 /gig:1973-01-04-main-point-bryn-mawr-pa-late  1973-01-04 THE MAIN POINT~ PA    <NA>  USA     #>  5 /gig:1973-01-05-main-point-bryn-mawr-pa-early 1973-01-05 THE MAIN POINT~ PA    <NA>  USA     #>  6 /gig:1973-01-05-main-point-bryn-mawr-pa-late  1973-01-05 THE MAIN POINT~ PA    <NA>  USA     #>  7 /gig:1973-01-06-main-point-bryn-mawr-pa-early 1973-01-06 THE MAIN POINT~ PA    <NA>  USA     #>  8 /gig:1973-01-06-main-point-bryn-mawr-pa-late  1973-01-06 THE MAIN POINT~ PA    <NA>  USA     #>  9 /gig:1973-01-08-paul-s-mall-boston-ma-early   1973-01-08 PAUL'S MALL, B~ MA    <NA>  USA     #> 10 /gig:1973-01-08-paul-s-mall-boston-ma-late    1973-01-08 PAUL'S MALL, B~ MA    <NA>  USA     #> # ... with 2,920 more rows  # how many concerts have occurred in each country?  concerts %>%    count(country, sort = TRUE) #> # A tibble: 39 x 2 #>    country       n #>    <chr>     <int> #>  1 USA        2261 #>  2 Canada       96 #>  3 England      88 #>  4 Australia    56 #>  5 Germany      52 #>  6 Spain        51 #>  7 Italy        50 #>  8 France       43 #>  9 Sweden       37 #> 10 Ireland      26 #> # ... with 29 more rows

title: All Things Data and Springsteen
text: also information setlists performed shows stored setlists.
code: setlists #> # A tibble: 52,100 x 4 #>    gig_key                                       song_key            song           song_number #>    <chr>                                         <chr>               <chr>                <int> #>  1 /gig:1973-01-03-main-point-bryn-mawr-pa-early /song:it-s-hard-to~ It's Hard To ~           1 #>  2 /gig:1973-01-03-main-point-bryn-mawr-pa-early /song:santa-ana     Santa Ana                2 #>  3 /gig:1973-01-03-main-point-bryn-mawr-pa-early /song:secret-to-th~ Secret To The~           3 #>  4 /gig:1973-01-03-main-point-bryn-mawr-pa-early /song:new-york-song New York Song            4 #>  5 /gig:1973-01-08-paul-s-mall-boston-ma-early   /song:growin-up     Growin' Up               1 #>  6 /gig:1973-01-09-wbcn-studio-boston-ma         /song:satin-doll    Satin Doll               1 #>  7 /gig:1973-01-09-wbcn-studio-boston-ma         /song:bishop-danced Bishop Danced            2 #>  8 /gig:1973-01-09-wbcn-studio-boston-ma         /song:wild-billy-s~ Circus Song              3 #>  9 /gig:1973-01-09-wbcn-studio-boston-ma         /song:song-for-orp~ Song For Orph~           4 #> 10 /gig:1973-01-09-wbcn-studio-boston-ma         /song:does-this-bu~ Does This Bus~           5 #> # ... with 52,090 more rows  # what song has been played most by Springsteen?  setlists %>%   count(song, sort = TRUE) #> # A tibble: 994 x 2 #>    song                            n #>    <chr>                       <int> #>  1 Born To Run                  1710 #>  2 Thunder Road                 1440 #>  3 The Promised Land            1387 #>  4 Badlands                     1195 #>  5 Tenth Avenue Freeze-Out      1107 #>  6 Dancing In The Dark          1050 #>  7 Born In The U.s.a.           1011 #>  8 The Rising                    881 #>  9 Rosalita (Come Out Tonight)   812 #> 10 Hungry Heart                  737 #> # ... with 984 more rows  # which song has most frequently opened a show?  setlists %>%   filter(song_number == 1) %>%   count(song, sort = TRUE) %>%   slice(1) #> # A tibble: 1 x 2 #>   song           n #>   <chr>      <int> #> 1 Growin' Up   272

title: All Things Data and Springsteen
text: details songs available songs, including album appearance also full lyrics cases. allows text mining sentiment analysis using package like tidytext.
code: library(tidytext)  # what word appears most frequently in the **Born in the U.S.A** album?  songs %>%    filter(album == "Born In The U.S.A.") %>%    select(title, lyrics) %>%    unnest_tokens(word, lyrics) %>%    count(word, sort = TRUE) %>%    anti_join(stop_words, by = 'word') #> # A tibble: 513 x 2 #>    word        n #>    <chr>   <int> #>  1 la        158 #>  2 yeah       47 #>  3 alright    41 #>  4 sha        40 #>  5 glory      37 #>  6 days       35 #>  7 u.s.a      32 #>  8 born       30 #>  9 hoo        27 #> 10 baby       26 #> # ... with 503 more rows

title: All Things Data and Springsteen
text: Lastly, tour table contains tours associated concert. course real advantage package combining different dataframes order infer useful information:
code: tours %>%    count(tour, sort = TRUE) #> # A tibble: 24 x 2 #>    tour                                                   n #>    <chr>                                              <int> #>  1 Non-tour Shows                                       575 #>  2 Springsteen On Broadway                              268 #>  3 The River Tour                                       213 #>  4 The Wild, The Innocent & The E Street Shuffle Tour   197 #>  5 Born In The U.S.A. Tour                              156 #>  6 Greetings From Asbury Park Tour                      147 #>  7 Wrecking Ball Tour                                   134 #>  8 The Reunion Tour                                     132 #>  9 The Ghost Of Tom Joad Tour                           128 #> 10 The Rising Tour                                      120 #> # ... with 14 more rows # what was the most played song on each tour? setlists %>%    left_join(tours, by = 'gig_key') %>%   count(song, tour) %>%   group_by(tour) %>%   filter(n == max(n)) %>%   arrange(desc(tour)) #> # A tibble: 95 x 3 #> # Groups:   tour [25] #>    song                       tour                            n #>    <chr>                      <chr>                       <int> #>  1 Death To My Hometown       Wrecking Ball Tour            134 #>  2 Leap Of Faith              World Tour 1992-93            103 #>  3 American Land              Working On A Dream Tour        83 #>  4 Born To Run                Working On A Dream Tour        83 #>  5 The Promised Land          Vote For Change                22 #>  6 Adam Raised A Cain         Tunnel Of Love Express Tour    67 #>  7 All That Heaven Will Allow Tunnel Of Love Express Tour    67 #>  8 Born In The U.s.a.         Tunnel Of Love Express Tour    67 #>  9 Born To Run                Tunnel Of Love Express Tour    67 #> 10 Brilliant Disguise         Tunnel Of Love Express Tour    67 #> # ... with 85 more rows

what: Metadata for concerts in the spRingsteen dataset. — concerts
title: Metadata for concerts in the spRingsteen dataset. — concerts
text: Metadata concerts played Bruce Springsteen solo numerous bands years 1973 2021. Can joined setlists using gig_key.

title: Metadata for concerts in the spRingsteen dataset. — concerts
Metadata for concerts in the spRingsteen dataset. — concerts
text: data frame 2,930 rows 6 variables: gig_key Primary key data frame. date Date concert. location Full location concert including venue name. state State concert performed (USA). city City concert performed (USA). country Country concert performed .

title: Metadata for concerts in the spRingsteen dataset. — concerts
text: http://brucebase.wikidot.com/

title: Metadata for concerts in the spRingsteen dataset. — concerts
code: library(dplyr) #>  #> Attaching package: ‘dplyr’ #> The following objects are masked from ‘package:stats’: #>  #>     filter, lag #> The following objects are masked from ‘package:base’: #>  #>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union # What countries have been played in the most?  concerts %>%   count(country, sort = TRUE) #> # A tibble: 39 × 2 #>    country       n #>    <chr>     <int> #>  1 USA        2261 #>  2 Canada       96 #>  3 England      88 #>  4 Australia    56 #>  5 Germany      52 #>  6 Spain        51 #>  7 Italy        50 #>  8 France       43 #>  9 Sweden       37 #> 10 Ireland      26 #> # … with 29 more rows  # What decade did most shows take place in?  library(lubridate) #>  #> Attaching package: ‘lubridate’ #> The following objects are masked from ‘package:base’: #>  #>     date, intersect, setdiff, union  concerts %>%   select(date) %>%   mutate(decade = (year(date) %/% 10) * 10) %>%   count(decade) #> # A tibble: 7 × 2 #>   decade     n #>    <dbl> <int> #> 1   1970   692 #> 2   1980   535 #> 3   1990   432 #> 4   2000   607 #> 5   2010   613 #> 6   2020    45 #> 7     NA     6

what: Metadata for setlists in the spRingsteen dataset. — setlists
title: Metadata for setlists in the spRingsteen dataset. — setlists
text: Metadata setlists concerts played Bruce Springsteen solo numerous bands years 1973 2021.

title: Metadata for setlists in the spRingsteen dataset. — setlists
Metadata for setlists in the spRingsteen dataset. — setlists
text: data frame 52,100 rows 4 variables: gig_key Key associated concert setlist . song_key Key associated song played. song Name song played. song_number Order appearance song setlist.

title: Metadata for setlists in the spRingsteen dataset. — setlists
text: http://brucebase.wikidot.com/

title: Metadata for setlists in the spRingsteen dataset. — setlists
code: library(dplyr) # what are the top five most played songs?  setlists %>%   count(song, sort = TRUE) %>%   slice(1:5) #> # A tibble: 5 × 2 #>   song                        n #>   <chr>                   <int> #> 1 Born To Run              1710 #> 2 Thunder Road             1440 #> 3 The Promised Land        1387 #> 4 Badlands                 1195 #> 5 Tenth Avenue Freeze-Out  1107  # what is the average show length?  setlists %>%   count(gig_key) %>%   summarise(ave_length = mean(n)) #> # A tibble: 1 × 1 #>   ave_length #>        <dbl> #> 1       19.4

title: Data for all songs in the spRingsteen dataset. — songs

title: Data for all songs in the spRingsteen dataset. — songs
code: library(dplyr) # What are the most common albums?  songs %>%   filter(!is.na(album)) %>%   count(album, sort = TRUE) #> # A tibble: 97 × 2 #>    album                                      n #>    <chr>                                  <int> #>  1 Tracks                                    58 #>  2 The Promise                               21 #>  3 The River                                 20 #>  4 The Rising                                15 #>  5 Human Touch                               14 #>  6 We Shall Overcome: The Seeger Sessions    14 #>  7 Working On A Dream                        14 #>  8 Wrecking Ball                             14 #>  9 Western Stars                             13 #> 10 Born In The U.S.A.                        12 #> # … with 87 more rows  # What word occurs most frequently in the lyrics from the album 'Born To Run' library(tidytext)  songs %>%  filter(album == 'Born To Run') %>%  select(title, lyrics) %>%  unnest_tokens(word, lyrics) %>%  count(word, sort = TRUE) %>%  anti_join(stop_words, by = 'word') #> # A tibble: 541 × 2 #>    word            n #>    <chr>       <int> #>  1 whoah          37 #>  2 backstreets    35 #>  3 hiding         30 #>  4 hey            27 #>  5 tenth          25 #>  6 night          20 #>  7 tonight        15 #>  8 ooh            14 #>  9 run            13 #> 10 avenue         11 #> # … with 531 more rows

what: Tour information for concerts in the spRingsteen dataset. — tours
title: Tour information for concerts in the spRingsteen dataset. — tours
text: Data describing tours associated concerts played Bruce Springsteen solo numerous bands years 1973 2021. Note concerts prior 1973 non-tour, e.g., practice shows, promotion shows, removed. Furthermore shows associated one tour entries concerts appear twice. Can joined setlists concerts using gig_key.

title: Tour information for concerts in the spRingsteen dataset. — tours
Tour information for concerts in the spRingsteen dataset. — tours
text: data frame 2,958 rows 2 variables: gig_key Primary key data frame. tour Tour associated concert. Note concerts  one tour associated .

title: Tour information for concerts in the spRingsteen dataset. — tours
code: library(dplyr) # How many shows were on each tour?  tours %>%   count(tour, sort = TRUE) #> # A tibble: 24 × 2 #>    tour                                                   n #>    <chr>                                              <int> #>  1 Non-tour Shows                                       575 #>  2 Springsteen On Broadway                              268 #>  3 The River Tour                                       213 #>  4 The Wild, The Innocent & The E Street Shuffle Tour   197 #>  5 Born In The U.S.A. Tour                              156 #>  6 Greetings From Asbury Park Tour                      147 #>  7 Wrecking Ball Tour                                   134 #>  8 The Reunion Tour                                     132 #>  9 The Ghost Of Tom Joad Tour                           128 #> 10 The Rising Tour                                      120 #> # … with 14 more rows
